text: I've had many requests to add a watermark to the thumbnails to better identify which ones are my videos. Hopefully it helps! I haven't played this game in a while now since it launched, but that's simply because I'm drowning in games to play. It's a great game I will surely revisit soon, especially since fighting games are perfect to hop in for quick sessions.
author: SupraDarky

text: I like the watermark! Thanks for another wonderful upload.
author: Zipherys

text: Wait, why? Could they not at least look at the username/description to see if you made it? Or are you saying that you only watermarked videos you, personally, made? If it is the latter, then I understand. But if it is the former? Then that is just pure laziness.
author: Joey Cummens

text: Why the watermark? Afraid of someone copying your videos?

text: Every time you pick a selection from a Tekken game I get really excited because these OSTs are so eclectic and wonderful. Compared to Street Fighter which seems to just hit some of the easier musical beats, Tekken strives to sound unique every time, Great selection, as always. <3
